summary: Dying aliens kidnap the pop group, Toomorrow, whose social musical instrument's "vibrations" are needed for their race to survive.
cast: Olivia Newton-John|Benny Thomas|Vic Cooper|Karl Chambers|Roy Dotrice|Imogen Hassall|Tracey Crisp|Margaret Nolan|Roy Marsden|Carl Rigg|Maria O'Brien|Stuart Henry|Kubi Chaza|Roy Beck|Celestine Burden|Louis Cabot|Shakira Caine|Lindsay Campbell|Maxine Casson|Norman Chappell|John Dommett|Lucy Fenwick|Joanna Henderson|Diane Keen|David Lodge|Rohan McCullough|Richard Ng|Jan O'Dell|Robert Raglan|Patrick Tull|Allan Warren|Lynda Westover
title: Toomorrow
